mutants.code:
def reverse_string(s):
    start = 1
    end = len(s) - 1
    while start < end:
        temp = s[start]
        s = s[:start] + s[end] + s[start + 1:]
        s = s[:end] + temp + s[end + 1:]
        start += 1
        end -= 1
    return s

        temp = s[start]
        s = s[:start] + s[end] + s[start + 1:]
        s = s[:end] + temp + s[end + 1:]
        start += 1

    return s
